title: June 30, 1909 Opening of Forbes Field postcard.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: June 30, 1909 Opening of Forbes Field postcard.
posts.post_content:
June 30, 1909 opening of Forbes Field postcard. The gentleman on the far left has a couple specs of white above his nose and the gentleman to the right of him has a spec of white on his check just to the right of the first gentleman. There is corner wear and toning on the back right. Price is $1000.00 and the s/h is $12.00 because of size.

Robert Edward Auctions had one of these that sold in its 2011 Spring Auction for $1410.00

[url]https://robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2011/spring/727/1909-forbes-field-opening-day-panoramic-postcard/[/url]
